detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract BaseToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BaseToken__1.sol#914-978) has payable functions:
	 - ERC1363.constructor(string,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BaseToken__1.sol#503-510)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [BaseToken](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BaseToken__1.sol#L914-L978) has payable functions:
	 - [ERC1363.constructor(string,string)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BaseToken__1.sol#L503-L510)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
